name: Dungeon & Burglar
description:
Just moving around can be so tough!
Sneak through traps on different floors to get treasures in this thrilling and action-packed game!
Find the best way to conquer each of the 30 dungeon floors by learning from each death!

■ Observe how enemies move and slip through them!
The player can only move.
The way forward is blocked by many enemies and obstacles!
Steal all treasures using big brain moves!

■ Die, learn, and break through!
Touching an enemy or trap is an instant death!
Every death helps you come up with a strategy to conquer each floor as you aim for the end!

■ Enhanced replayability!
Plenty of replayability with trophies, time attack, and ranking boards!
This simple game gives the player plenty of room for deep gameplay.
